title: Revamp of ARURF
body:
Ik alot of people will agree with me that the way ARURF is currently presented is not currently the best, as while you do get 2 re-rolls, you can still get champions you don't play and don't want to, or champions that are downright horrible when compared to other champions in URF. i do indeed like the direction Riot was going when they said they wanted to try and make it more interesting as you are given a randomized champion, but don't you think they went about it the wrong way?
What i propose instead is in champion select, you are given a select few champions that is randomized every lobby that you may choose from. The enemy team will have the same pool of champions as your team so it is not unfair (Just like the Blood Moon Gamemode), and make all champions unlocked the prevent URF only accounts and truly make it all random, but it gives the player the freedom to choose what they want to play. I believe this would prevent alot of backlash from the community that ARURF receives because if the other team gets "all OP champs, while i get bad champs", then you can also choose those "OP champs".
To make it even more interesting, why not ask the community what the worst champions on urf are and have a select list of only "terrible tier champions" where both teams would get bad champs and you see the madness unfold as you awkwardly try to play the gamemode against equally unsuitable champions in URF. i would personally laugh so hard seeing champions like {{champion:77}}  and {{champion:48}}  play this, but that is just my opinion, and may not be yours.
or even better why not buff every champion to be just as OP as un-nerfed URF hecarim, and remove all restraints so you can see the true power of champions, probably not, but alas
Anyway, to those that are or have read this, i hope you all enjoy URF/ARURF while it's still up
-BladeSensual

replies.body: If you don't like ARURF, simply don't play the game mode. I myself enjoy playing game modes where your champ is randomly selected. I find it an interesting way to find champions you like

it's not about me not liking it, and if you read my post you would've understood that instead of going bull at the gate to reply. it's not random at all because every single game i see roughly 60% of the same champs i had in my last game. Riot has even mentioned before that it is not random even though it is stated it is.
Or, they make all champs available then give teams same random selection of 5.
udyr is awesome in this, he runs so fast, hes good late game roamer and pusher, trundle i can understand, but, but, buuuuuuuuuuut, pillars for dayz
